levelw = 20 levelh = 13
create_world( levelw, levelh)
fill_floor("fl-rough", 0,0,levelw,levelh) draw_border( "st-rock1")
oxyd_default_flavor = "a"
oxyd( 3, 0) oxyd( 6, 0) oxyd( 13, 0) oxyd( 16, 0) oxyd( 19, 4) oxyd( 19, 8) oxyd( 0, 4) oxyd( 0, 8) oxyd( 3, 12) oxyd( 9, 12) oxyd( 13, 12) oxyd( 16, 12)
oxyd_shuffle()
function yy1( color, x, y) stone = format( "st-%s4", color) set_stone( stone, x, y) end
yy1( "white", 3, 3) yy1( "white", 9, 3) yy1( "white", 15, 3) yy1( "white", 5, 4) yy1( "white", 11, 4) yy1( "white", 17, 4) yy1( "white", 2, 5) yy1( "white", 8, 5) yy1( "white", 14, 5) yy1( "white", 4, 6) yy1( "white", 10, 6) yy1( "white", 16, 6) yy1( "white", 4, 9) yy1( "white", 10, 9) yy1( "white", 15, 9) yy1( "black", 7, 3) yy1( "black", 13, 3) yy1( "black", 6, 6) yy1( "black", 12,6) yy1( "black", 2, 7) yy1( "black", 8, 7) yy1( "black", 14, 7) yy1( "black", 5, 8) yy1( "black", 11, 8) yy1( "black", 17, 8) yy1( "black", 6, 9) yy1( "black", 12, 9)
